short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to summarize content and check grammar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SmartText Enhancer is a productivity tool designed to elevate your writing with powerful features: grammar checking, spelling checking and text summarization. Whether you're composing an email, writing a blog post, or preparing a report, SmartText Enhancer ensures your text is clear, concise, and error-free.

Key Features:
Grammar Check: Instantly identify and correct grammatical errors to enhance the clarity and professionalism of your writing.
Text Summarization: Quickly summarize lengthy paragraphs or articles to get the gist of the content in a fraction of the time.
Spelling Check: Instantly identify and correct spelling errors for maintaining professionalism of your writing.
*Updated the character limit to 15K.

How It Works:
Paste Your Text: Simply paste the text you want to enhance into the input box.
Choose an Action: Select suitable button to perform an action.
Get Results: Receive instant feedback or a summary of your text, displayed right in the extension.
